Episodes.Title: Mark 8:36

Episodes.Title: Genesis 27:29
Episodes.Plot: Michael plays a game of Russian roulette with the mentally challenged brother of a neighborhood store he wants to take over.  Tommy is working on keeping a highway spur from going through the hill by wheeling and dealing behind the scenes.  Eileen gets some upsetting news at the doctor's office.

Episodes.Title: Matthew 13:57

Episodes.Title: Matthew 12:25
Episodes.Plot: Tommy sees an opportunity to make some money when the governor asks him to introduce a bill that would create jobs on the hill but would also tear down some houses.  Michael deals with Armenian drug dealers working out of a local bar.  Rose fights back when they want to lay off 25 workers at the mill.
